attr.title: A Thanksgiving Game
attr.desc: A mini farming sim that lasts just 5 days, much like the game jam it was made for. You are tasked with preparing a small town's Thanksgiving feast by Thursday.
attr.inst: Download the A_Thanksgiving_Game_v1.4.zip at itch.io https://aptbenj.itch.io/a-thanksgiving-game and copy data.win and options.ini into assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download A_Thanksgiving_Game_v1.4.zip at [itch.io](https://aptbenj.itch.io/a-thanksgiving-game) and copy data.win and options.ini into assets folder.
